item.description:
Our next meeting is on THURSDAY, December 3rd at 7 PM at the ARTS and CRAFTS Lounge at the SENIOR CENTER on 49 Pleasant Street off READING SQUARE.

NOTE:This is a change from the Senior Center Lounge. I applied on-line over a month ago to have the Lounge but as my luck would have it they didn't receive the application (I also talked with the scheduler about it and she said it was ours for the night) so I got what was left. The room is on the second floor across from the Lounge.

Sorry about the mixup but looking forward to seeing everyone.

I will be talking about the recent finding of a viral connection to CFS (and probably FMS too) that has been in the news the last month.

E-mail me if you want to present any findings or interesting information at the meeting.

See you on Thursday, December 3rd.

Betsy
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with the briefcase and all the papers in front of me.
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia December Meetup
